title: 村上春樹：無論高牆是多麼正確，雞蛋是多麼地錯誤，我永遠站在雞蛋這邊。

replies.msg:
見到呢兩日咁多五毛分化post
我只係想引用村上春樹拎諾貝爾文學獎時的講話 提醒大家

以卵擊石，在高大堅硬的牆和雞蛋之間，我永遠站在雞蛋那方。無論高牆是多麼正確，雞蛋是多麼地錯誤，我永遠站在雞蛋這邊。

希望大家諗清楚依家邊個係極權 乜野叫不割 加油
自推
push
push
push
雞蛋

外國理撚得你
總之佢覺得你哋越嚟越暴力 佢就冇立場支持香港

但同時唔一定要認晒錯
可以掉轉叫外國認清香港示威者武力背後嘅原因
香港極權 只能用對付極權嘅手段
警鄉黑親中市民勾結已達當年北愛爾蘭新教班撚屌嘅程度
靠大家玩多啲twitter reddit 做吓文宣
twitter玩法可以起我底 有篇文教大家上手

replies.msg:
邊個話你聽外國人覺得好暴力 唔支持？
係出面班吹風撚定你真係去了解過？

我係住外國既 我一路有幫手同朋友 同事講解發生緊咩事
暫時仲未聽到有人好似你咁講

呢到好多時比我既感覺係 乜都好驚外國人觀感
實際上 根本就諗太多
舉個例 機場打大陸記者單野 果時個個都洗版話輸硬
事實呢？ 睇番當時bbc cnn 報導 根本無人割你
係香港人自己割自己

replies.msg:
BBC:
https://www.bbc.com/news/world-asia-china-49949548
Anti-government marches in Hong Kong have ended in rioting, with attacks on government offices, a metro station and businesses with ties to mainland China.

CNN:
https://edition.cnn.com/2019/10/05/asia/hong-kong-protests-mask-emergency-intl-hnk/index.html
Violent protests which began Friday stretched into the early hours of Saturday, beyond the midnight deadline when the new anti-mask regulations began. They spread out across the city and soon devolved into violent clashes, with protesters throwing petrol bombs and police responding with pepper spray and tear gas.

UN rights chief :
https://www.hongkongfp.com/2019/10/06/un-rights-chief-troubled-alarmed-hong-kong-violence/
UN human rights chief Michelle Bachelet said Saturday she was “troubled” by Hong Kong’s increasingly violent pro-democracy protests

BBC:
https://www.bbc.com/news/world-asia-china-49949548
Anti-government marches in Hong Kong have ended in rioting, with attacks on government offices, a metro station and businesses with ties to mainland China.

CNN:
https://edition.cnn.com/2019/10/05/asia/hong-kong-protests-mask-emergency-intl-hnk/index.html
Violent protests which began Friday stretched into the early hours of Saturday, beyond the midnight deadline when the new anti-mask regulations began. They spread out across the city and soon devolved into violent clashes, with protesters throwing petrol bombs and police responding with pepper spray and tear gas.

UN rights chief :
https://www.hongkongfp.com/2019/10/06/un-rights-chief-troubled-alarmed-hong-kong-violence/
UN human rights chief Michelle Bachelet said Saturday she was “troubled” by Hong Kong’s increasingly violent pro-democracy protests

replies.msg:
平心而論BBC果篇有將因果連繫得幾緊密

但CNN果篇就咁:
It has also grown increasingly violent, with protesters attacking police with petrol bombs and makeshift weapons, and the force responding with tear gas and water cannon. Fights have also broken out between protesters and counter-demonstrators and critical passersby, many of whom have been savagely beaten by the crowds.
Businesses with connections to the government or China have become a target in recent weeks with protesters targeting mainland Chinese businesses, public banners, flags and other symbols of China.

而聯合國果條友嘅說法亦都個別指出咗示威者嘅所謂暴力嚟責備

replies.msg:
我當然有做

之前咁多個月都寫左幾個月警察濫暴 又點計？
為左幾個報導既title 而拖自己後腳
我靜係想講 大眾唔係on9 唔好覺得人地唔識分是非
同埋 香港發生緊既事係外國示威係小事
根本大眾市民係唔會為左呢啲野割你

點都好 我靜係想講 做對外宣傳係好
但唔好成日人地都未割你 就自己割自己 搞到內部分化
對成件事無幫助 仲為自己增加左好多不必要既壓力
